title: my new pixel 4 is stuck in a reboot loop I think, all it shows is the google "G" and will not restar
content: My pixel4 looks stuck in a reboot loop from what i have read. All it will do is restart with the Google "G" on the screen with a gray load bar strolling under the g. I have tried to restart in recovery mode but it goes right back to the "G" with the bar under it. I dont know what else to do.
